item.title: The Battle of Ashengate
item.description: This week Loral takes a look at the recent change and controversy surrounding the two high-end hunting zones in The Serpent's Spine.

item.title: Three Big Changes to Everquest
item.description: In today's article, Loral discusses three big changes to Everquest: out of combat regeneration, expendable alternate advancement points, and the new tiered spell system available in the Serpent's Spine expansion.

item.title: Success Criteria for the Serpent's Spine
item.description: Today Loral takes a look at the elements required for the success of the Serpent's Spine.

item.title: Prophecy of Ro Single Group Progression Video
item.description: Based on the recent videos of Prophecy's raider end-game, Loral Ciriclight cuts up a little video showing the path of a single group hunter in Prophecy of Ro.

item.title: A Preview of the Serpent's Spine
item.description: Today Loral discusses his preview tour of the Serpent's Spine.

item.title: Should You Become a Raider?
item.description: Loral takes a look at the advantages and disadvantages of the path of the high-end raider. Should you become a raider? Read on and learn what such a choice requires.

item.title: Snapping the Serpent's Spine
item.description: In today's article, Loral discusses the recent announcement that the Serpent's Spine expansion will be download only. Say it isn't so, Joe.

item.title: Breaking News: Serpent's Spine Announced
item.description: Tonight Sony Online Entertainment released new information on Everquest's twelfth expansion, the Serpent's Spine. Read on for our initial preview.

item.title: The New Hotzones of Everquest
item.description: In today's article, Loral discusses the recent chances to the hotzone mechanic including global rare drops, "call for help" NPCs, and new named creatures in all of the latest batch of hotzones.

item.title: A Moss Snake Kicks You for 4 ^H^H^H^H^H
item.description: Today we look at the most recent patch of Everquest, pontificate more on the Combine server, and mourn the loss of Everquest's greatest bug.

item.title: The Dangers of Progression, The Serpent's Spine, SOE's Vanguard
item.description: This week Loral takes a look at the news surrounding the Progression server, the rumored name of the next expansion, and SOE's co-publication of Vanguard.

item.title: Five Recommended Improvements to Prophecy of Ro
item.description: Today Loral Ciriclight looks at five ways to improve the latest Everquest expansion, Prophecy of Ro.

item.title: Spring 2006 Summit and Fan Faire Final Report
item.description: Today Loral reviews and organizes all of the news gathered in Atlanta Georgia at the Everquest Spring 2006 Summit and Fan Faire.

item.title: Notes from the Spring 2006 Summit and Fan Faire
item.description: Loral begins his living journal with notes from the Everquest Spring 2006 Summit and Fan Faire. Watch often for frequent updates. Update: first details of the next expansion, newso on a new "non-classic" classic server, discussions of death and downtime.

item.title: Loral's Evil Agenda, Spring 2006
item.description: With an Everquest Community Summit and Fan Faire just a week away, Loral takes a look at the full scope of the game to pick out the five improvements that may have the greatest impact to Everquest.
